ruleset.name: Code Style
ruleset.description: Rules which enforce a specific coding style.

rule.name: MisplacedPragma
rule.message: Pragma should be used only inside the declaration block before 'BEGIN'.
rule.description: Oracle states that the PRAQMA AUTONOMOUS_TRANSACTION must be in the declaration block, but the code does not complain, when being compiled on the 11g DB. https://docs.oracle.com/cd/B28359_01/appdev.111/b28370/static.htm#BABIIHBJ

rule.name: CursorForLoopNaming
rule.message: Use meaniningful names for loop variables
rule.description: In case you have nested loops please name the loop variables more meaningful.
